tools.name: aioli
tools.description: JavaScript library for running biowasm tools

tools.name: base
tools.description: Module used by Aioli for the base filesystem (only needed if all other tools have reinit set to true)

tools.name: bcftools
tools.description: Parse .vcf / .bcf variant calling files

tools.name: bedtools
tools.description: Parse .bed files and perform complex genome arithmetic

tools.name: bhtsne
tools.description: Run the t-SNE dimensionality-reduction algorithm

tools.name: bowtie2
tools.description: Align sequencing reads (.fastq) files to a reference genome

tools.name: cawlign
tools.description: Align/map sequences in a FASTA file to a reference sequence in a codon-aware manner

tools.name: coreutils
tools.description: Bash utilities such as head, tail, ls, sort, uniq, etc.

tools.name: fastp
tools.description: Evaluate data quality of .fastq files

tools.name: findutils
tools.description: Search for files in a folder

tools.name: fasttree
tools.description: Build phylogenetic trees from multiple sequence alignments

tools.name: gawk
tools.description: Manipulate data files with patterns of interest

tools.name: gfatools
tools.description: Tools for manipulating pangenome sequence graphs

tools.name: gffread
tools.description: Parse and file .gff/.gtf files

tools.name: grep
tools.description: Search and filter files

tools.name: htslib
tools.description: Bioinformatics file format utilities: tabix, htsfile, and bgzip

tools.name: hyphy
tools.description: Comparative sequence analysis using stochastic evolutionary models

tools.name: ivar
tools.description: Tools for viral amplicon-based sequencing

tools.name: jq
tools.description: Filter and wrangle JSON strings

tools.name: kalign
tools.description: Multiple sequence alignment

tools.name: kentutils
tools.description: File conversion utilities

tools.name: libarchive
tools.description: Unzip .zip files

tools.name: lsd2
tools.description: A phylogeny dating method

tools.name: mafft
tools.description: Multiple sequence alignment for amino acid or nucleotide sequences

tools.name: minimap2
tools.description: Pairwise sequence alignment

tools.name: modbam2bed
tools.description: Summarize .bam modified bases as .bed files with counts

tools.name: mummer4
tools.description: Rapidly align entire genomes

tools.name: muscle
tools.description: Multiple alignments of biological sequences

tools.name: samtools
tools.description: Parse .sam / .bam read alignment files

tools.name: sed
tools.description: Find and replace utilities

tools.name: seq-align
tools.description: Align sequences using Smith-Waterman/Needleman-Wunsch

tools.name: seqtk
tools.description: Parse and wrangle .fasta / .fastq files

tools.name: ssw
tools.description: A SIMD implementation of the Smith-Waterman algorithm

tools.name: tn93
tools.description: Pairwise distance on FASTA files using Tamura Nei 93 distance

tools.name: tree
tools.description: List folder contents in a tree format

tools.name: ViralConsensus
tools.description: Call viral consensus genomes from read alignments

tools.name: wgsim
tools.description: Simulate short reads from a reference genome
